CVE-2009-0008.title: QuickTime Input Validation Flaw in MPEG-2 Playback Component for Windows Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0008.body: A vulnerability was reported in the QuickTime MPEG-2 Playback Component for Windows. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted MPEG-2 movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The QuickTime MPEG-2 Playback Component is not installed by default with QuickTime.Systems running Mac OS X are not affected.Richard Lemon of Code Lemon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0008.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0009.title: Apple Pixlet Video Codec Memory Corruption Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0009.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Apple Pixlet Video codec. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2009-0009.extra: A remote user can create a movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0010.title: Mac OS X Bugs in CoreGraphics and QuickDraw Manager Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0010.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X in the CoreGraphics and QuickDraw Manager components. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF or PICT file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted PDF file can trigger a memory corruption error in CoreGraphics [CVE-2009-0145].A specially crafted PDF file can trigger an integer overflow in CoreGraphics [CVE-2009-0155]. Systems prior to Mac OS X version 10.5 are not affected. Barry K. Nathan reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted PICT image can trigger a memory corruption error in QuickDraw Manager [CVE-2009-0160].A specially crafted PICT image can trigger an integer overflow in QuickDraw Manager [CVE-2009-0010]. Damian Put and Sebastian Apelt reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint. Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services also reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0010.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0011.title: Mac OS X Certificate Assistant Temporary File Bug Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0011.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X Certificate Assistant. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Certificate Assistant does properly handle temporary files. A local user can exploit this to cause files to be modified with the privileges of a target user running Certificate Assistant.Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 are not affected.
CVE-2009-0011.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-0016.title: iTunes DAAP Protocol Handling Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0016.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iTunes. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can send a Digital Audio Access Protocol (DAAP) message containing a specially crafted Content-Length parameter value to cause the target iTunes application to enter an infinite loop.Mac OS X systems are not affected.Xiaopeng Zhang, Zhenhua Liu, and Junfeng Jia of Fortinet's FortiGuard Global Security Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0016.extra: A remote user can cause the target iTunes application to enter an infinite loop.

CVE-2009-0021.title: NTP Signature Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass Validation Checks
CVE-2009-0021.body: A vulnerability was reported in NTP. A remote user can bypass digital signature validation.The software does not properly check the results of the OpenSSL EVP_VerifyFinal() function. As a result, a remote server can supply a specially crafted invalid signature on a certificate that will be detected as a valid certificate. Signature checks on DSA and ECDSA keys used with SSL/TLS are affected.Clients that connect to servers using RSA keys are not affected.Client certificate validation is not affected.
CVE-2009-0021.extra: A remote user can bypass certificate validation.

CVE-2009-0022.title: Samba Grants Remote Authenticated Users Access to the Root Filesystem in Certain Cases
CVE-2009-0022.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba. A remote authenticated user can access certain files on the target system in certain cases.When a remote authenticated user connects to a share with an empty name ("") via a version of smbclient prior to 3.0.28, the user can access the root filesystem. Systems with registry shares enabled ("registry shares = yes") and with the "include = registry" and "config backend = registry" settings enabled are affected [not the default configuration].Gunter Hockel reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0022.extra: A remote authenticated user can access files on the root filesystem ("/") with their own privileges.

CVE-2009-0027.title: JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Discloses XML Files to Remote Users
CVE-2009-0027.body: A vulnerability was reported in JBoss Enterprise Application Platform. A remote user can view certain files on the target system.The JBossWS request handler does not properly validate the resource path specified in user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted request to view XML files on target system with the privileges of the JBoss EAP process.
CVE-2009-0027.extra: A remote user can view XML files on the target system with the privileges of the JBoss EAP process.

CVE-2009-0030.title: SquirrelMail on Red Hat Uses Fixed Session ID Values
CVE-2009-0030.body: A vulnerability was reported in SquirrelMail. A remote authenticated user can hijack user sessions.The version issued with Red Hat Security Advisory RHSA-2009:0010 contains a session handling flaw. When a remote authenticated user logs out and then logs in without restarting their web browser, the system will issue a fixed session ID. As a result, the remote authenticated user can highjack user sessions.
CVE-2009-0030.extra: A remote authenticated user can hijack user sessions.

CVE-2009-0033.title: Tomcat Java AJP Connector Header Procesing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0033.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a request with specially crafted headers via the Java AJP connector to cause the target mod_jk load balancing worker to be blocked for approximately one minute.A demonstration exploit request is provided:GET /servlets-examples/ HTTP/1.1Host: localhost:xYoshihito Fukuyama reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0033.extra: A remote user can cause temporary denial of service conditions.

CVE-2009-0034.title: Sudo Supplemental Group Privilege Error Lets Certain Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0034.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sudo. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system in certain cases.The software does not properly process supplemental group entries in the 'sudoers' configuration file. A local user that is permitted to run commands as any user of a group that the local user is also a member of can run certain commands with root privileges.Harald Koenig reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0034.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system in certain cases.

CVE-2009-0037.title: cURL/libcurl HTTP Redirect Processing May Let Remote Users Access Files
CVE-2009-0037.body: A vulnerability was reported in cURL. A remote user may be able to view files on the target system.A remote server can supply a specially crafted HTTP redirect response to the requesting application (pointing to a 'file://' URL) to cause the application to load a local file instead of the requested resource.libcurl configurations that use CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION may be affected.On systems with libcurl compiled to support SCP, a remote server can cause the target application to download arbitrary content. A demonstration exploit command is provided:Location: scp://name:passwd@host/a'``;date >/tmp/test``;'The vendor was notified on February 6, 2009.The original advisory is available at:http://www.withdk.com/2009/03/03/curllibcurl-redirect-arbitrary-file-access/David Kierznowski reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0037.extra: A remote user may be able to view files on the target system in certain situations.

CVE-2009-0041.title: Asterisk Discloses Whether User Accounts Are Valid to Remote Users
CVE-2009-0041.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote user can determine valid user accounts on the target system.The IAX2 service responds differently to valid and invalid authentication attempts. A remote user can determine whether the specified user name exists on the target system or not.The vendor was notified on October 15, 2008.unprotectedhex.com reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0041.extra: A remote user can determine valid user accounts on the target system.

CVE-2009-0053.title: Cisco IronPort PXE Encryption May Disclose Secure E-mail Message Contents to Remote Users in Certain Cases
CVE-2009-0053.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IronPort PXE Encryption. A remote user monitoring the network can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can obtain the unique, per-message decryption key and then decrypt an intercepted secure e-mail message [CVE-2009-0053].A remote user can modify the contents of an intercepted secure e-mail messages or forge a close copy of the e-mail message to convince the target user to view a modified secure e-mail message, resulting in the exposure of the target user's credentials and message content [CVE-2009-0054].The following versions are affected: * All PostX 6.2.1 versions prior to 6.2.1.1 * All PostX 6.2.2 versions prior to 6.2.2.3 * All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.4 versions prior to 6.2.4.1.1 * All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.5 versions * All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.6 versions * All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.7 versions prior to 6.2.7.7 * All IronPort Encryption Appliance 6.3 versions prior to 6.3.0.4 * All IronPort Encryption Appliance 6.5 versions prior to 6.5.0.2IronPort C, M and S-Series appliances are not affected.J.B. Snyder of Brintech reported one of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0053.extra: A remote user monitoring the network can view the contents of intercepted secure e-mail messages.

CVE-2009-0055.title: Cisco IronPort Encryption Appliances Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks to Modify Users Preferences
CVE-2009-0055.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IronPort Encryption Appliances. A remote user can modify certain parameters via the target administration interface.A remote user can exploit a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) flaw to modify the target user's preferences, including the user name and personal security passphrase but not the password [CVE-2009-0055].A remote user can exploit a CSRF flaw to execute a command and modify the target user's preferences, including the user name and personal security pass phrase but not the password [CVE-2009-0056].The following versions are affected:* All PostX 6.2.1 versions prior to 6.2.1.1* All PostX 6.2.2 versions prior to 6.2.2.3* All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.4 versions prior to 6.2.4.1.1* All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.5 versions* All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.6 versions* All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.7 versions prior to 6.2.7.7* All IronPort Encryption Appliance 6.3 versions prior to 6.3.0.4* All IronPort Encryption Appliance 6.5 versions prior to 6.5.0.2IronPort C, M and S-Series appliances are not affected.
CVE-2009-0055.extra: A remote user can access certain functions on the target administration interface.

CVE-2009-0056.title: Cisco IronPort Encryption Appliances Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks to Modify Users Preferences
CVE-2009-0056.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IronPort Encryption Appliances. A remote user can modify certain parameters via the target administration interface.A remote user can exploit a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) flaw to modify the target user's preferences, including the user name and personal security passphrase but not the password [CVE-2009-0055].A remote user can exploit a CSRF flaw to execute a command and modify the target user's preferences, including the user name and personal security pass phrase but not the password [CVE-2009-0056].The following versions are affected:* All PostX 6.2.1 versions prior to 6.2.1.1* All PostX 6.2.2 versions prior to 6.2.2.3* All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.4 versions prior to 6.2.4.1.1* All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.5 versions* All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.6 versions* All IronPort Encryption Appliance/PostX 6.2.7 versions prior to 6.2.7.7* All IronPort Encryption Appliance 6.3 versions prior to 6.3.0.4* All IronPort Encryption Appliance 6.5 versions prior to 6.5.0.2IronPort C, M and S-Series appliances are not affected.
CVE-2009-0056.extra: A remote user can access certain functions on the target administration interface.

CVE-2009-0057.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaw in Certificate Authority Proxy Function Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0057.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.If the Certificate Authority Proxy Function (CAPF) service is enabled [not the default configuration], a remote user can send specially crafted data to the target service to cause the interruption of voice services.Version 7.0(1) is not affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsq32032 to this vulnerability.VoIPshield reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0057.extra: A remote user can interrupt voice services.

CVE-2009-0058.title: Cisco Wireless LAN Controller Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0058.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Wireless LAN Controller. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can invoke a vulnerability scanner to cause the target system to stop processing web authentication or cause the target device to reload [CVE-2009-0058]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsq44516 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP POST request to the target web authentication 'login.html' page to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2009-0059]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsm82364 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted IP packets to cause the target device to hang [CVE-2009-0061]. A reboot is required to return the system to normal operations. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCso60979 to this vulnerability.The Cisco Wireless LAN Controllers (WLCs), Cisco Catalyst 6500 Wireless Services Modules (WiSMs), and Cisco Catalyst 3750 Integrated Wireless LAN Controllers are affected.
CVE-2009-0058.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to hang or reload.

CVE-2009-0059.title: Cisco Wireless LAN Controller Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0059.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Wireless LAN Controller. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can invoke a vulnerability scanner to cause the target system to stop processing web authentication or cause the target device to reload [CVE-2009-0058]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsq44516 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP POST request to the target web authentication 'login.html' page to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2009-0059]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsm82364 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted IP packets to cause the target device to hang [CVE-2009-0061]. A reboot is required to return the system to normal operations. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCso60979 to this vulnerability.The Cisco Wireless LAN Controllers (WLCs), Cisco Catalyst 6500 Wireless Services Modules (WiSMs), and Cisco Catalyst 3750 Integrated Wireless LAN Controllers are affected.
CVE-2009-0059.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to hang or reload.

CVE-2009-0061.title: Cisco Wireless LAN Controller Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0061.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Wireless LAN Controller. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can invoke a vulnerability scanner to cause the target system to stop processing web authentication or cause the target device to reload [CVE-2009-0058]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsq44516 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP POST request to the target web authentication 'login.html' page to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2009-0059]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsm82364 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted IP packets to cause the target device to hang [CVE-2009-0061]. A reboot is required to return the system to normal operations. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCso60979 to this vulnerability.The Cisco Wireless LAN Controllers (WLCs), Cisco Catalyst 6500 Wireless Services Modules (WiSMs), and Cisco Catalyst 3750 Integrated Wireless LAN Controllers are affected.
CVE-2009-0061.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to hang or reload.

CVE-2009-0062.title: Cisco Wireless LAN Controller Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0062.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Wireless LAN Controller. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated restricted user (i.e., Lobby Admin) can gain full administrative rights on the target system.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsv62283 to this vulnerability.The Cisco Wireless LAN Controllers (WLCs), Cisco Catalyst 6500 Wireless Services Modules (WiSMs), and Cisco Catalyst 3750 Integrated Wireless LAN Controllers are affected.Wireless network users are not affected.
CVE-2009-0062.extra: A remote authenticated restricted user can obtain full administrative rights on the target system.

CVE-2009-0063.title: Symantec Brightmail Input Validation Flaw in Brightmail Control Center Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-0063.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Symantec Brightmail Appliance. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Brightmail Control Center management console does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Symantec Brightmail device and will run in the security context of that device. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the device, or take actions on the device acting as the target user.Dr. Marian Ventuneac, Perot Systems, Ireland reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0063.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Symantec Brightmail device, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the device, or take actions on the device acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-0065.title: HP NonStop Server Telco CLIMs Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service or Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0065.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP NonStop Server. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted Partial Reliable Stream Control Transmission Protocol (PR-SCTP) data to execute arbitrary code on the target system or cause denial of service conditions.
CVE-2009-0065.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2009-0069.title: Solaris NFS Client nfs4rename_persistent_fh() Recursion Error Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0069.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Solaris NFS client. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can trigger a recursion error in nfs4rename_persistent_fh() and cause a kernel panic on the target system.
CVE-2009-0069.extra: A local user can cause a kernel panic on the target system.

CVE-2009-0078.title: Microsoft Windows Privilege Separation and Access Control Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0078.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Windows. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) provider does not properly isolate processes that run under the NetworkService or LocalService accounts [CVE-2009-0078]. A local user with NetworkService or LocalService account privileges can probe the WMI provider host processes to identify SYSTEM tokens and then exploit the SYSTEM token to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.The RPCSS service does not properly isolate processes that run under the NetworkService or LocalService accounts [CVE-009-0079]. A local user with SeImpersonatePrivilege privileges may be able to obtain elevated privileges.Windows applies incorrect access control lists (ACLs) on threads in the current ThreadPool [CVE-2009-0080]. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges.Cesar Cerrudo of Argeniss reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0078.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-0079.title: Microsoft Windows Privilege Separation and Access Control Bugs Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0079.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Windows. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) provider does not properly isolate processes that run under the NetworkService or LocalService accounts [CVE-2009-0078]. A local user with NetworkService or LocalService account privileges can probe the WMI provider host processes to identify SYSTEM tokens and then exploit the SYSTEM token to execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.The RPCSS service does not properly isolate processes that run under the NetworkService or LocalService accounts [CVE-009-0079]. A local user with SeImpersonatePrivilege privileges may be able to obtain elevated privileges.Windows applies incorrect access control lists (ACLs) on threads in the current ThreadPool [CVE-2009-0080]. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges.Cesar Cerrudo of Argeniss reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0079.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-0081.title: Windows Kernel Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0081.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Windows Kernel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted WMF or EMF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an input validation flaw in the graphics device interface (GDI) and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Helmut Buhler reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0081.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0082.title: Windows Kernel Handle/Pointer Validation Bugs Let Local Users Gain System Privileges
CVE-2009-0082.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel-level privileges.The kernel does not properly validate handles [CVE-2009-0082].The kernel does not properly validate pointers [CVE-2009-0083].Thomas Garnier of SkyRecon reported one of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0082.extra: A local user can execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-0083.title: Windows Kernel Handle/Pointer Validation Bugs Let Local Users Gain System Privileges
CVE-2009-0083.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Windows Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with kernel-level privileges.The kernel does not properly validate handles [CVE-2009-0082].The kernel does not properly validate pointers [CVE-2009-0083].Thomas Garnier of SkyRecon reported one of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0083.extra: A local user can execute arbitrary code with kernel-level privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-0084.title: Microsoft DirectX Bug in Decompressing DirectShow MJPEG Content Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0084.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft DirectX. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted MJPEG file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the Microsoft DirectShow component in the decompression of MJPEG files and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Piotr Bania of Kryptos Logic reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0084.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0085.title: Windows SChannel TLS Handshake Authentication Flaw Lets Certain Remote Users Spoof the System
CVE-2009-0085.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows SChannel. A remote user with access to a user's digital certificate can spoof the system to gain access.The SChannel authentication component does properly authenticate certain Transport Layer Security (TLS) handshake messages. A remote user with access to a target user's digital certificate can send a specially crafted TLS packet to impersonate the target user.The Secretaria da Fazenda do Estado do Rio Grande do Sul and Cia de Processamento de Dados do Estado do Rio Grande do Sul reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0085.extra: A remote user with access to a target user's digital certificate can spoof the system to gain access to the target system with the privileges of the target user.

CVE-2009-0086.title: Windows HTTP Services Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0086.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Windows HTTP Services. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can spoof web sites.A remote user (web service) can return specially crafted data to the requesting target user or service to trigger flaws in Windows HTTP Services (WinHTTP) and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or the target service using the WinHTTP API.Specially crafted values can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2009-0086]. Greg MacManus of iSIGHT Partners Labs reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted distinguished name in a digital certificate, in combination with other other attacks such as DNS spoofing, may allow a remote user to spoof the digital certificate of a web site for the target application that uses the WinHTTP AIP [CVE-2009-0089]. Wan-Teh Chang and Cem Paya of Google reported this vulnerability.A remote user can capture and replay the target user's user's NTLM logon credentials to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2009-0550].
CVE-2009-0086.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can spoof web sites.

CVE-2009-0088.title: Microsoft WordPad and Office Text Converter Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0088.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Office in WordPad and Office Text Converters. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted Word 6 file can trigger memory corruption [CVE-2009-0087]. A researcher with Fortinet s FortiGuard Global Security Research Team reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted WordPerfect 6.x file can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2009-0088]. A researcher with VeriSign iDefense Labs reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted Word document can trigger stack overflow [CVE-2009-0235]. Sean Larsson and Jun Mao of VeriSign iDefense Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0088.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0089.title: Windows HTTP Services Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0089.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Windows HTTP Services. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can spoof web sites.A remote user (web service) can return specially crafted data to the requesting target user or service to trigger flaws in Windows HTTP Services (WinHTTP) and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or the target service using the WinHTTP API.Specially crafted values can trigger an integer overflow [CVE-2009-0086]. Greg MacManus of iSIGHT Partners Labs reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted distinguished name in a digital certificate, in combination with other other attacks such as DNS spoofing, may allow a remote user to spoof the digital certificate of a web site for the target application that uses the WinHTTP AIP [CVE-2009-0089]. Wan-Teh Chang and Cem Paya of Google reported this vulnerability.A remote user can capture and replay the target user's user's NTLM logon credentials to execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2009-0550].
CVE-2009-0089.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can spoof web sites.

CVE-2009-0093.title: Microsoft DNS Server Registration Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Spoofing Attacks
CVE-2009-0093.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft DNS Server. A remote user can conduct a man-in-the-middle attack to spoof the system.The server does not properly restrict registration of Web Proxy Auto-Discovery (WPAD) or Intra-Site Automatic Tunnel Addressing Protocol (ISATAP) entries on the DNS server. If the name registration does not exist, a remote user can register a WPAD or ISATAP entry and spoof the legitimate web proxy or ISATAP route and intercept or redirect Internet traffic.
CVE-2009-0093.extra: A remote user can spoof the legitimate web proxy or ISATAP route and intercept or redirect Internet traffic.

CVE-2009-0100.title: Microsoft Excel Malformed Object Memory Corruption Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0100.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Excel. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create an Excel file with a specially crafted object that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Office Excel Viewer 2003 SP3, Microsoft Office Excel Viewer, and Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint 2007 File Formats SP1 are also affected.Haifei Li of Fortinet s FortiGuard Global Security Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0100.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0120.title: IBM WebSphere DataPower Security Gateway Can Be Crashed By Remote Users
CVE-2009-0120.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere DataPower XS40. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data over an SSL connection to cause the target device to crash and reboot.erik at psafe.nl reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0120.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to crash.

CVE-2009-0123.title: Safari RSS Feed Bug Discloses Files to Remote Users
CVE-2009-0123.body: A vulnerability was reported in Safari. A remote user can read files on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will read from files on the target user's system.The vendor has been notified.The original advisory is available at:http://brian.mastenbrook.net/display/27Brian Mastenbrook reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0123.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will gain read access to files on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0132.title: Solaris aio_suspend() Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0132.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can invoke a system call to trigger an integer overflow in aio_suspend(3RT) and cause a kernel panic.The vendor was notified on September 15, 2008.The original advisory is available at:http://www.trapkit.de/advisories/TKADV2009-001.txtTobias Klein reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0132.extra: A local user can cause a kernel panic.

CVE-2009-0135.title: Amarok Integer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0135.body: A vulnerability was reported in Amarok. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Audible digital audio file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow or memory allocation error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in '\src\metadata\audible\audibletag.cpp'.The vendor was notified on January 5, 2009.Tobias Klein reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.trapkit.de/advisories/TKADV2009-002.txt
CVE-2009-0135.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0136.title: Amarok Integer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0136.body: A vulnerability was reported in Amarok. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Audible digital audio file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow or memory allocation error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in '\src\metadata\audible\audibletag.cpp'.The vendor was notified on January 5, 2009.Tobias Klein reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.trapkit.de/advisories/TKADV2009-002.txt
CVE-2009-0136.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0141.title: Apple Xterm Lets Local Users Write to Other User Xterms
CVE-2009-0141.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Xterm. A local user can send information to a target user's Xterm.Xterm creates tty devices with world-writable and world-readable permissions. A local user can send information directly to a target user's Xterm.
CVE-2009-0141.extra: A local user can send information to a target user's Xterm.

CVE-2009-0143.title: iTunes May Disclose Username and Password to Podcast Servers
CVE-2009-0143.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iTunes. A remote user can obtain passwords.A remote user can create a specially crafted podcast that, when subscribed to by the target user, will cause the target user to be presented with an authentication dialog. When the target user enters their username and password, the information will be sent to the podcast server.Simon Bellwood reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0143.extra: A remote user can obtain the target user's username and password in certain cases.

CVE-2009-0145.title: Mac OS X Bugs in CoreGraphics and QuickDraw Manager Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0145.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X in the CoreGraphics and QuickDraw Manager components. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF or PICT file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted PDF file can trigger a memory corruption error in CoreGraphics [CVE-2009-0145].A specially crafted PDF file can trigger an integer overflow in CoreGraphics [CVE-2009-0155]. Systems prior to Mac OS X version 10.5 are not affected. Barry K. Nathan reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted PICT image can trigger a memory corruption error in QuickDraw Manager [CVE-2009-0160].A specially crafted PICT image can trigger an integer overflow in QuickDraw Manager [CVE-2009-0010]. Damian Put and Sebastian Apelt reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint. Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services also reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0145.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0146.title: Xpdf Buffer Overflows and Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0146.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Xpdf. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory free error in the JBIG2 decoder and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.Integer overflows can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0147, CVE-2009-1179].Buffer overflows can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0146, CVE-2009-1182].Several flaws may cause arbitrary memory to be incorrectly freed, executing arbitrary code [CVE-2009-0166, CVE-2009-1180].Input validation flaws can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0800].Will Dormann of the CERT/CC created the JBIG2 decoder testsuite that was used to discover these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0146.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0147.title: Xpdf Buffer Overflows and Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0147.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Xpdf. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory free error in the JBIG2 decoder and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.Integer overflows can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0147, CVE-2009-1179].Buffer overflows can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0146, CVE-2009-1182].Several flaws may cause arbitrary memory to be incorrectly freed, executing arbitrary code [CVE-2009-0166, CVE-2009-1180].Input validation flaws can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0800].Will Dormann of the CERT/CC created the JBIG2 decoder testsuite that was used to discover these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0147.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0148.title: Mac OS X CFF Font and Cscope Source File Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0148.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a document containing specially crafted Compact Font Format (CFF) fonts that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow in Apple Type Services and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-0154]. Charlie Miller of Independent Security Evaluators reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A remote user can create a specially crafted source file that, when viewed by the target user with Cscope, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-0148].
CVE-2009-0148.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0149.title: Mac OS X Disk Image Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0149.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A specially crafted sparse disk image can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2009-0150]. Systems prior to OS X 10.5 are not affected. Tiller Beauchamp of IOActive reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted sparse disk image can trigger memory corruption flaws [CVE-2009-0149].
CVE-2009-0149.extra: A remote user can create a disk image that, when mounted by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0150.title: Mac OS X Disk Image Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0150.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system.A specially crafted sparse disk image can trigger a stack overflow [CVE-2009-0150]. Systems prior to OS X 10.5 are not affected. Tiller Beauchamp of IOActive reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted sparse disk image can trigger memory corruption flaws [CVE-2009-0149].
CVE-2009-0150.extra: A remote user can create a disk image that, when mounted by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0154.title: Mac OS X CFF Font and Cscope Source File Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0154.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a document containing specially crafted Compact Font Format (CFF) fonts that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow in Apple Type Services and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-0154]. Charlie Miller of Independent Security Evaluators reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A remote user can create a specially crafted source file that, when viewed by the target user with Cscope, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-0148].
CVE-2009-0154.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0155.title: Mac OS X Bugs in CoreGraphics and QuickDraw Manager Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0155.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X in the CoreGraphics and QuickDraw Manager components. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF or PICT file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted PDF file can trigger a memory corruption error in CoreGraphics [CVE-2009-0145].A specially crafted PDF file can trigger an integer overflow in CoreGraphics [CVE-2009-0155]. Systems prior to Mac OS X version 10.5 are not affected. Barry K. Nathan reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted PICT image can trigger a memory corruption error in QuickDraw Manager [CVE-2009-0160].A specially crafted PICT image can trigger an integer overflow in QuickDraw Manager [CVE-2009-0010]. Damian Put and Sebastian Apelt reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint. Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services also reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0155.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0156.title: Mac OS X Finder and Spotlight Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0156.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X in the Launch Services and Spotlight components. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when downloaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system or trigger a memory access error and cause denial of service conditions.A specially crafted Mach-O executable file may cause Finder to crash and reload repeatedly [CVE-2009-0156].A specially crafted Microsoft Office file may cause the Microsoft Office Spotlight Importer to crash or cause arbitrary code to be executed [CVE-2009-0944].
CVE-2009-0156.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when downloaded by the target user, will cause the target application to crash or execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0157.title: Mac OS X CFNetwork Heap Overflow in Processing HTTP Headers Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0157.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mac OS X in the CFNetwork component. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote web server can return specially crafted HTTP headers to trigger a heap overflow in CFNetwork and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Systems prior to Mac OS X version 10.5 are not affected.Moritz Jodeit of n.runs AG reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0157.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0159.title: ntp Buffer Overflow in ntpq cookedprint() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0159.body: A vulnerability was reported in ntpq. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Apple reported this vulnerability.On June 25, 2009, Sun reported that Solaris is not affected by this vulnerability [http://blogs.sun.com/security/entry/solaris_not_impacted_by_cve].
CVE-2009-0159.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0160.title: Mac OS X Bugs in CoreGraphics and QuickDraw Manager Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0160.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X in the CoreGraphics and QuickDraw Manager components. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF or PICT file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A specially crafted PDF file can trigger a memory corruption error in CoreGraphics [CVE-2009-0145].A specially crafted PDF file can trigger an integer overflow in CoreGraphics [CVE-2009-0155]. Systems prior to Mac OS X version 10.5 are not affected. Barry K. Nathan reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted PICT image can trigger a memory corruption error in QuickDraw Manager [CVE-2009-0160].A specially crafted PICT image can trigger an integer overflow in QuickDraw Manager [CVE-2009-0010]. Damian Put and Sebastian Apelt reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint. Chris Ries of Carnegie Mellon University Computing Services also reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0160.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0162.title: Apple Safari Bug in Processing 'feed:' URLs Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary JavaScript
CVE-2009-0162.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'feed:' URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary JavaScript on the target user's system.Systems prior to Mac OS X v10.5 are not affected.Billy Rios and Microsoft Vulnerability Research (MSVR) and Alfredo Melloni reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0162.extra: A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0163.title: CUPS Integer Overflow in Processing TIFF Images Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0163.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted TIFF image to trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2009-0163.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0166.title: Xpdf Buffer Overflows and Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0166.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Xpdf. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory free error in the JBIG2 decoder and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.Integer overflows can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0147, CVE-2009-1179].Buffer overflows can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0146, CVE-2009-1182].Several flaws may cause arbitrary memory to be incorrectly freed, executing arbitrary code [CVE-2009-0166, CVE-2009-1180].Input validation flaws can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0800].Will Dormann of the CERT/CC created the JBIG2 decoder testsuite that was used to discover these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0166.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0169.title: Sun Java System Access Manager Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0169.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Access Manager. A remote authenticated administrator can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated sub-realm administrator can create another amadmin user in the sub-realm. The newly created amadmin user account can login to the root realm with administrator privileges.
CVE-2009-0169.extra: A remote authenticated sub-realm administrator can gain root realm administrator privileges.

CVE-2009-0170.title: Sun Java System Access Manager Discloses Passwords to Remote Authenticated Administrative Users
CVE-2009-0170.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Java System Access Manager. A remote authenticated administrative user can view certain passwords.Certain configuration items visible via the administration console may reveal passwords. A remote authenticated user with privileges to access the administration console can view passwords that allow the user to gain unauthorized access to resources.Sun Java System Identity Manager 7.1 is also affected.
CVE-2009-0170.extra: A remote authenticated administrative user can view certain passwords.

CVE-2009-0171.title: Sun SPARC Enterprise Server May Ship in a Non-Secure Configuration
CVE-2009-0171.body: A vulnerability was reported in certain Sun SPARC Enterprise Servers. A remote user can gain root access on the target system.Certain Sun SPARC Enterprise M4000 and M5000 servers are shipped with an incorrect configuration. As a result, the Fault Management Architecture (FMA) may not perform correctly, the SunMC will not be available, and remote users may be able to use the manufacturing root password to gain access to the target system.
CVE-2009-0171.extra: A remote user can gain root access on the target system.

CVE-2009-0172.title: IBM DB2 Data Stream Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0172.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in IBM DB2. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause unspecified denial of service conditions.IBM has assigned APARs IZ36534, IZ37697, IZ39373, and IZ39653 to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0172.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2009-0173.title: IBM DB2 Data Stream Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0173.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in IBM DB2. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause unspecified denial of service conditions.IBM has assigned APARs IZ36534, IZ37697, IZ39373, and IZ39653 to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0173.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2009-0177.title: VMware authd Service Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0177.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted username or password to the authd service to cause the target service to crash.VMware Player and VMware workstation are affected.Laurent Gaffie reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/7647
CVE-2009-0177.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2009-0185.title: QuickTime Buffer Overflows in Processing Multiple Media Formats Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0185.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in QuickTime. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted media file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A movie file with specially crafted MS ADPCM-encoded audio data can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0185]. Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted Sorenson 3 video file can trigger a memory corruption bug [CVE-2009-0188]. Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted FLC compression file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0951]. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted compressed PSD image can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2009-0952]. Damian Put reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted PICT image can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0953]. Sebastian Apelt reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A movie file with specially crafted Clipping Region (CRGN) atom types can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0954]. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A movie file with specially crafted image description atoms can trigger a sign extension bug [CVE-2009-0955]. Roee Hay of IBM Rational Application Security Research Group reported this vulnerability.A movie file with a specially crafted user data atom can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0956]. Lurene Grenier of Sourcefire, Inc. (VRT) reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted JP2 image can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0957]. Charlie Miller of Independent Security Evaluators and Damian Put (via TippingPoint) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0185.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0186.title: Winamp CAF File Integer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0186.body: A vulnerability was reported in Winamp. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted CAF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow in 'libsndfile.dll' and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on February 20, 2009.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.[Editor's note: The vulnerability resides in the libsndfile code that is included within Winamp.]
CVE-2009-0186.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0188.title: QuickTime Buffer Overflows in Processing Multiple Media Formats Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0188.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in QuickTime. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted media file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A movie file with specially crafted MS ADPCM-encoded audio data can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0185]. Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted Sorenson 3 video file can trigger a memory corruption bug [CVE-2009-0188]. Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted FLC compression file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0951]. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted compressed PSD image can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2009-0952]. Damian Put reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted PICT image can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0953]. Sebastian Apelt reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A movie file with specially crafted Clipping Region (CRGN) atom types can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0954]. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A movie file with specially crafted image description atoms can trigger a sign extension bug [CVE-2009-0955]. Roee Hay of IBM Rational Application Security Research Group reported this vulnerability.A movie file with a specially crafted user data atom can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0956]. Lurene Grenier of Sourcefire, Inc. (VRT) reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted JP2 image can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0957]. Charlie Miller of Independent Security Evaluators and Damian Put (via TippingPoint) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0188.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0191.title: Foxit Reader JBIG2 Symbol Dictionary Segment Memory Error Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0191.body: A vulnerability was reported in Foxit Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PDF file containing specially crafted JBIG2 symbol dictionary segments that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on February 27, 2009.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0191.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0193.title: Adobe Reader Flaws in JBIG2 Filter Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary
CVE-2009-0193.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PDF file with specially crafted JBIG2-encoded stream that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the JBIG2 filters and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Sean Larsson of iDefense Labs, Jonathan Brossard from iViZ Security Research Team, Will Dormann of CERT/CC, and Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0193.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0194.title: Garmin Communicator Plugin ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Access the Target GPS Device
CVE-2009-0194.body: A vulnerability was reported in Garmin Communicator Plugin. A remote user can bypass domain locking controls to access data from the target device.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the GARMINAXCONTROL.GarminAxControl_t.1 ActiveX control (npGarmin.dll) and access potentially sensitive data on the target Garmin GPS device. Data can be viewed and deleted and firmware updates can be installed.The vendor was notified on March 19, 2009, without response.The original advisory is available at:http://secunia.com/secunia_research/2009-16/Dyon Balding of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0194.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will read or delete data or install firmware updates on the target device.

CVE-2009-0196.title: Ghostscript Heap Overflow in jbig2dec Library Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0196.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ghostscript. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in the jbig2dec library in the decoding of JBIG2 symbol dictionary segments and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on March 26, 2009.Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0196.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0198.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0198.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint), Jun Mao and Ryan Smith of iDefense Labs, Haifei Li of Fortinet's FortiGuard Global Security Research Team, the Apple Product Security Team, Matthew Watchinski of Sourcefire VRT, Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research, Mark Dowd of the IBM Internet Security Systems X-Force, Will Dormann of CERT, and Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0198.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0201.title: OpenOffice Table Parsing Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0201.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenOffice. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a file with specially crafted records that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on May 18, 2009.Dyon Balding of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0201.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0202.title: Microsoft PowerPoint Buffer Overflow in Freelance Translator Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0202.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft PowerPoint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the Microsoft PowerPoint Freelance Windows 2.1 Translator (FL21WIN.DLL) and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vendor was notified on May 22, 2009.Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0202.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0204.title: HP Select Access Unspecified Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-0204.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Select Access. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP Select Access software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2009-0204.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Select Access software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-0219.title: BlackBerry Enterprise Server Bug in BlackBerry Attachment Service PDF Distiller Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0219.body: A vulnerability was reported in BlackBerry Enterprise Server. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can send a specially crafted PDF file that, when opened by the target user on a BlackBerry smartphone, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system that hosts the BlackBerry Attachment Service.RIM has assigned SDRs 278437, 278003, 278012, and 278031 to this vulnerability.BlackBerry Professional Software version 4.1.4 is also affected.Sean Larsson of iDefense Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0219.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system that hosts the BlackBerry Attachment Service.

CVE-2009-0220.title: Microsoft PowerPoint Has Multiple Buffer Overflows and Memory Corruption Bugs That Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0220.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft PowerPoint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PowerPoint file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.PowerPoint Viewer 2003 and PowerPoint Viewer 2007 SP2 and SP3 are also affected.Microsoft Works 8.5 and 9.0 are also affected.Sean Larsson and Marsu Pilami of VeriSign iDefense Labs, Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Security, an anonymous researcher (via iDefense), Marsu Pilami (via TippingPoint), Ling and Wushi of team509 (via TippingPoint), and Carsten H. Eiram of Secunia reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0220.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.
