CVE-2009-0562.title: Microsoft Office Web Components Buffer Overflows in ActiveX Control Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0562.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Office. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory allocation error in the Office Web Components ActiveX control and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft Internet Security and Acceleration Server 2004 SP3 and 2006 SP1, Microsoft BizTalk Server 2002, Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2003 SP1, and Microsoft Office Small Business Accounting 2006 are also affected.Peter Vreugdenhil of Zero Day Initiative and Sean Larsson of VeriSign iDefense Labs each reported some of these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0562.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0563.title: Microsoft Word Buffer Overflows Let Remote USers Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0563.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Word. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a Word file that contains a specially crafted record that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Wushi of team509 (via TippingPoint) and Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0563.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0565.title: Microsoft Word Buffer Overflows Let Remote USers Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0565.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Word. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a Word file that contains a specially crafted record that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Wushi of team509 (via TippingPoint) and Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0565.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0566.title: Microsoft Office Publisher Pointer Dereference Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0566.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Publisher. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Publisher file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a pointer dereference and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Lionel d'Hauenens of Labo Skopia reported this vulnerability via VeriSign iDefense Labs.
CVE-2009-0566.extra: A remote user can create a Publisher file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0568.title: Windows RPC Marshalling Engine Memory Error Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0568.body: A vulnerability was reported in Windows RPC. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can send a specially crafted message to trigger a state error in the Remote Procedure Call (RPC) Marshalling Engine and execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges.
CVE-2009-0568.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-0578.title: GNOME NetworkManager Lets Local Users Modify Network Configuration Settings.
CVE-2009-0578.body: A vulnerability was reported in GNOME NetworkManager. A local user can modify network connection settings.A local user can modify local connection settings, preventing the target system's network connection from functioning properly.The vulnerability resides in 'gconf-helpers/nma-gconf-connection.c'.
CVE-2009-0578.extra: A local user can modify local network connection settings.

CVE-2009-0580.title: Tomcat Authentication Response Error Lets Remote Users Determine Valid Usernames
CVE-2009-0580.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system.In certain configurations, a remote user can send specially encoded password values to determine if the specified username exists on the target system.Systems using form-based authentication (j_security_check) with one of the followingauthentication realms are affected:MemoryRealmDataSourceRealmJDBCRealmD. Matscheko and T. Hackner of SEC Consult reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0580.extra: A remote user can determine valid usernames on the target system.

CVE-2009-0581.title: LittleCMS Memory Leak Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0581.body: A vulnerability was reported in LittleCMS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to a target application that uses the LittleCMS (lcms) library to trigger a memory leak in lcms and cause the target application to crash.Chris Evans reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0581.extra: A remote user can cause the target application using the lcms library to crash.

CVE-2009-0582.title: Evolution Camel NTLM SASL Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2009-0582.body: A vulnerability was reported in Evolution. A remote server can obtain potentially sensitive information from the target client.A remote server can send specially crafted NTLM SASL authentication challenge packets (NTLM authentication type 2 packets) to cause the target client to return a portion of system memory.The flaw resides in the ntlm_challenge() function in 'camel/camel-sasl-ntlm.c'.
CVE-2009-0582.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from system memory.

CVE-2009-0583.title: Ghostscript Overflows in International Color Consortium Format Library Lets Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0583.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ghostscript. A user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A user can create a specially crafted International Color Consortium (ICC) file. When the target user opens a specially crafted PostScript or PDF file containing embedded images, a buffer overflow may occur and arbitrary code may be executed with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in 'icclib/icc.c'.
CVE-2009-0583.extra: A user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0584.title: Ghostscript Overflows in International Color Consortium Format Library Lets Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0584.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ghostscript. A user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A user can create a specially crafted International Color Consortium (ICC) file. When the target user opens a specially crafted PostScript or PDF file containing embedded images, a buffer overflow may occur and arbitrary code may be executed with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in 'icclib/icc.c'.
CVE-2009-0584.extra: A user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0590.title: OpenSSL ASN1_STRING_print_ex() Invalid Memory Access Flaw Lets Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0590.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote or local user that can cause an OpenSSL-based application to print a BMPString or UniversalString (e.g., print the contents of a certificate) can trigger a memory access flaw in the ASN1_STRING_print_ex() function and cause the target application to crash.
CVE-2009-0590.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2009-0591.title: OpenSSL CMS_verify() Error Handling Flaw Lets Users Bypass Security Checks
CVE-2009-0591.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can bypass certain security checks.A remote user with access to a signer's private key can generate a specially crafted signature that is not valid but will be detected as valid. The vulnerability resides in the CMS_verify() function in the handling of an error condition with specially crafted signed attributes.Only CMS users are affected.Ivan Nestlerode reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0591.extra: A remote user can create an invalid signature that will be determined to be a valid signature.

CVE-2009-0599.title: Wireshark Tektronix K12 and NetScreen Snoop File Reading Errors Let Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0599.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can create a specially crafted NetScreen snoop file that, when loaded by Wireshark, will cause Wireshark to crash.A user can create a specially crafted Tektronix K12 text capture file that, when loaded by Wireshark, will cause Wireshark to crash.On non-Windows systems, a local user can set a specially crafted HOME environment variable value containing format string characters to cause Wireshark to crash.
CVE-2009-0599.extra: A user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2009-0600.title: Wireshark Tektronix K12 and NetScreen Snoop File Reading Errors Let Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0600.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can create a specially crafted NetScreen snoop file that, when loaded by Wireshark, will cause Wireshark to crash.A user can create a specially crafted Tektronix K12 text capture file that, when loaded by Wireshark, will cause Wireshark to crash.On non-Windows systems, a local user can set a specially crafted HOME environment variable value containing format string characters to cause Wireshark to crash.
CVE-2009-0600.extra: A user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2009-0611.title: Novell QuickFinder Server Input Validation Flaws in HTTP POST Parameters Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-0611.body: Ivan Sanchez from NULL CODE SERVICES reported a vulnerability in Novell QuickFinder Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted HTTP POST request that, when submitted by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Novell QuickFinder Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'siteloc' parameter of the 'displayaddsite' function is affected.The 'generalproperties site' parameter of the 'globalsearchsite' function is affected.The 'clusterserviceproperties site' parameter of the 'services, synchronization' function is affected.The 'adminurl' parameter of the 'querystring' function is affected.
CVE-2009-0611.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Novell QuickFinder Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-0612.title: InterScan Web Security Suite Discloses Proxy-Authentication Password
CVE-2009-0612.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro InterScan Web Security Suite. A remote user can obtain password information.When basic authorization is enabled, the system does not remove authentication information from the 'Proxy-Authentication' header in certain cases. A remote user monitoring the network or hosting a web server can obtain the username and password from the unsanitized header.david.vorel reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0612.extra: A remote user can obtain password information.

CVE-2009-0613.title: Trend Micro InterScan Web Security Suite Lets Certain Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0613.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro InterScan Web Security Suite. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user with "Auditor" or "Report Only" privileges can access some JSP pages to modify system configuration settings.
CVE-2009-0613.extra: A remote authenticated user with "Auditor" or "Report Only" privileges can modify system configuration settings.

CVE-2009-0615.title: Cisco Application Networking Manager Incorrect Directory Permissions Let Remote Users View/Modify Files
CVE-2009-0615.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Cisco Application Networking Manager. A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can exploit incorrect directory permissions to view or modify files on target system.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsv66063 and CSCsv70130 to this vulnerability.The Cisco Application Control Engine (ACE) Device Manager versions prior to A3(2.1) are also affected.The Cisco ACE XML Gateway, Cisco ACE GSS (Global Site Selector) 4400 Series, and Cisco ACE Web Application Firewall are not affected.The National Australia Bank's Security Assurance team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0615.extra: A remote user can view or modify files on the target system.

CVE-2009-0625.title: Cisco Application Control Engine SNMP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0625.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in the Cisco Application Control Engine. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted SNMPv1 packet to a device explicitly configured for SNMPv2c to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2009-0624]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsu36038 and CSCsu47876 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted SNMPv3 packet to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2009-0625]. Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsq45432 and CSCso83126 to this vulnerability.The Cisco ACE XML Gateway, the Cisco ACE Web Application Firewall, and the Cisco ACE GSS 4400 Series Global Site Selector Appliances are not affected.
CVE-2009-0625.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2009-0626.title: Cisco IOS WebVPN and SSLVPN Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0626.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS WebVPN and SSLVPN. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTPS packet to cause the target device to hang or reload [CVE-2009-0626]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCsk62253 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted SSLVPN session date to trigger a memory leak on the target device, eventually causing the device to crash [CVE-2009-0628]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCsw24700 to this vulnerability.Devices configured with SSLVPN are affected.The following products are not affected: * Cisco ASA 5500 Series Adaptive Security Appliances * Cisco IOS XR Software * Cisco IOS XE Software
CVE-2009-0626.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to fail to accept SSLVPN connections or crash.

CVE-2009-0628.title: Cisco IOS WebVPN and SSLVPN Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0628.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS WebVPN and SSLVPN. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTPS packet to cause the target device to hang or reload [CVE-2009-0626]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCsk62253 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted SSLVPN session date to trigger a memory leak on the target device, eventually causing the device to crash [CVE-2009-0628]. Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCsw24700 to this vulnerability.Devices configured with SSLVPN are affected.The following products are not affected: * Cisco ASA 5500 Series Adaptive Security Appliances * Cisco IOS XR Software * Cisco IOS XE Software
CVE-2009-0628.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to fail to accept SSLVPN connections or crash.

CVE-2009-0635.title: Cisco IOS Easy VPN Server Cisco Tunneling Control Protocol Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0635.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS when configured as an Easy VPN server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a series of specially crafted TCP packets to cause the target system to run out of memory. The target Cisco Tunneling Control Protocol (cTCP) service may crash or the target device may crash.Devices configured for cTCP encapsulation for EZVPN server are affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug IDs CSCsr16693 and CSCsu21828 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0635.extra: A remote user can cause the target cTCP service to crash or the target device to crash.

CVE-2009-0637.title: Cisco IOS Secure Copy Server Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0637.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS in the Secure Copy server implementation. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user with an attached command-line interface (CLI) view on a server configured as an SCP server can read and write to arbitrary files on the target device. This includes the configuration file, which contains passwords and other potentially sensitive information, and the device image.Cisco has assigned Cisco Bug ID CSCsv38166 to this vulnerability.The Cisco IOS SCP server is disabled by default.CLI views are part of the Cisco IOS Role-Based CLI Access feature, which is disabled by default.The Cisco IOS SCP client feature is not affected.Cisco IOS XR is not affected.Kevin Graham reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0637.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-0642.title: Ruby OCSP_basic_verify() Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Certificate Spoofing Attacks
CVE-2009-0642.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby. A remote user can conduct certificate spoofing attacks.The OCSP_basic_verify() function in 'ext/openssl/ossl_ocsp.c' does not properly validate X.509 certificates. A remote user may be able to present an invalid certificate that will not be detected as invalid by the target user.
CVE-2009-0642.extra: A remote user can conduct certificate spoofing attacks.

CVE-2009-0651.title: Symantec Veritas NetBackup vnetd Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0651.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Veritas NetBackup. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user with access to the target system's local network can insert arbitrary code during the administrative login exchange between the Veritas network daemon (vnetd) and the client. Arbitrary code can be executed on the target system with administrative privileges.National Australia Bank's Security Assurance team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0651.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0658.title: Adobe Acrobat Reader Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0658.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Acrobat Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.This vulnerability is being actively exploited.
CVE-2009-0658.extra: A remote user can create a PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0681.title: PGP Desktop IOCTL Validation Flaws in Pgpdisk.sys and Pgpwded.sys Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0681.body: A vulnerability was reported in PGP Desktop. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted IOCTL request to 'pgpwded.sys' to execute arbitrary code on the target system with System privileges.A local user can supply a specially crafted IOCTL request to 'pgpdisk.sys' to cause the target system to crash.The vendor was notified on February 4, 2009.Nikita Tarakanov, Positive Technologies Research Team, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0681.extra: A local user can obtain System level privileges on the target system.A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2009-0686.title: Trend Micro Internet Security Buffer Overflow in 'tmactmon.sys' Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0686.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro Internet Security. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted IOCTL parameter value to the 'tmactmon.sys' driver to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code with System privileges.The vendor was notified on February 4, 2009.Nikita Tarakanov of the Positive Technologies Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0686.extra: A local user can obtain System privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-0688.title: Cyrus SASL Buffer Overflow in sasl_encode64 Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0688.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cyrus SASL. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow in the sasl_encode64() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The original advisory is available at:http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/238019US-CERT reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0688.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0689.title: libc gdtoa Array Overrun May Let Remote or Local Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0689.body: A vulnerability was reported in libc. A remote or local user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote or local user can supply a specially crafted value containing format string specifiers to an application that uses the libc gdtoa code to trigger an array overrun in libc and execute arbitrary code. The code will run with the privileges of the target application.The vendor was notified on May 7, 2009.Maksymilian Arciemowicz of SecurityReason.com reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://securityreason.com/achievement_securityalert/63
CVE-2009-0689.extra: A remote or local user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system, depending on the applications that use the affected libc code.

CVE-2009-0690.title: Foxit Reader JPEG2000 Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0690.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Foxit Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PDF file with specially crafted JPEG2000 data that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory access error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the JPEG2000/JBIG Decoder add-on. The Foxit Reader itself is not affected unless the add-on is installed.The vendor was notified on June 2, 2009.The original advisory is available at:http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/251793Will Dormann of the CERT/CC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0690.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0691.title: Foxit Reader JPEG2000 Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0691.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Foxit Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PDF file with specially crafted JPEG2000 data that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory access error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in the JPEG2000/JBIG Decoder add-on. The Foxit Reader itself is not affected unless the add-on is installed.The vendor was notified on June 2, 2009.The original advisory is available at:http://www.kb.cert.org/vuls/id/251793Will Dormann of the CERT/CC reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0691.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0692.title: DHCP dhclient Stack Overflow in script_write_params() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0692.body: A vulnerability was reported in the DHCP dhclient. A remote server can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote server can return a specially crafted leased address and subnet-mask value to the connected dhclient to trigger a stack overflow in the script_write_params() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with root privileges.Mandriva Linux Engineering Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0692.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.

CVE-2009-0720.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0720.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to execute arbitrary code on the target system.No details were provided.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via iDefense.
CVE-2009-0720.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0723.title: LittleCMS Integer Overflows and Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0723.body: A vulnerability was reported in LittleCMS. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted image file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger an integer overflow or input validation flaw and crash the target application or execute arbitrary code on the target system.Chris Evans reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0723.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target application, will crash the target application or execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0733.title: LittleCMS Integer Overflows and Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0733.body: A vulnerability was reported in LittleCMS. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted image file that, when processed by the target application, will trigger an integer overflow or input validation flaw and crash the target application or execute arbitrary code on the target system.Chris Evans reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0733.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target application, will crash the target application or execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0743.title: Cisco Unified MeetingPlace Input Validation Flaw in Account Details and Meeting Details Pages Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-0743.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified MeetingPlace. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cisco Unified MeetingPlace software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Account Details page and the Meeting Details page is affected.Cisco has assigned Cisco bug ID CSCsv66321 to this vulnerability.The Security Assurance Team of the National Australia Bank reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0743.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cisco Unified MeetingPlace software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-0771.title: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript and Layout Engine Memory Corruption Bugs May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0771.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The layout engine is affected [CVE-2009-0771, CVE-2009-0772, CVE-2009-0774].The JavaScript engine is affected [CVE-2009-0773].Mozilla SeaMonkey is also affected.Martijn Wargers, Jesse Ruderman, Josh Soref, Gary Kwong, and Timothee Groleau reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0771.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0772.title: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript and Layout Engine Memory Corruption Bugs May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0772.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The layout engine is affected [CVE-2009-0771, CVE-2009-0772, CVE-2009-0774].The JavaScript engine is affected [CVE-2009-0773].Mozilla SeaMonkey is also affected.Martijn Wargers, Jesse Ruderman, Josh Soref, Gary Kwong, and Timothee Groleau reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0772.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0773.title: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript and Layout Engine Memory Corruption Bugs May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0773.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The layout engine is affected [CVE-2009-0771, CVE-2009-0772, CVE-2009-0774].The JavaScript engine is affected [CVE-2009-0773].Mozilla SeaMonkey is also affected.Martijn Wargers, Jesse Ruderman, Josh Soref, Gary Kwong, and Timothee Groleau reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0773.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0774.title: Mozilla Firefox JavaScript and Layout Engine Memory Corruption Bugs May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0774.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The layout engine is affected [CVE-2009-0771, CVE-2009-0772, CVE-2009-0774].The JavaScript engine is affected [CVE-2009-0773].Mozilla SeaMonkey is also affected.Martijn Wargers, Jesse Ruderman, Josh Soref, Gary Kwong, and Timothee Groleau reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0774.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0775.title: Mozilla Firefox Cloned XUL DOM Element Access Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0775.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory management error in the garbage collection process and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A page containing a set of cloned XUL DOM elements that are linked as a parent and child can trigger this vulnerability when the page is reloaded.Mozilla SeaMonkey is affected.An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2009-0775.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0776.title: Mozilla Firefox RDFXMLDataSource Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Information from Arbitrary Domains
CVE-2009-0776.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke nsIRDFService and issue a cross-domain redirect to obtain arbitrary XML data from another domain on the target user's browser.Mozilla SeaMonkey is also affected.Georgi Guninski reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0776.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from arbitrary domains.

CVE-2009-0777.title: Mozilla Firefox Location Bar Can Be Spoofed Using Specially Crafted Control Characters
CVE-2009-0777.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mozilla Firefox. A remote user can spoof the location bar URL.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL containing certain invisible control characters that, when loaded by the target user, will spoof the URL in the location bar.Mozilla SeaMonkey is affected.Masahiro Yamada reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0777.extra: A remote user can spoof the location bar URL.

CVE-2009-0779.title: IBM AIX Buffer Overflow in 'pppdial' May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2009-0779.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A local user may be able to obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can supply a specially crafted input string that is longer than 4000 characters to trigger a buffer overflow in 'pppdial' and execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.
CVE-2009-0779.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2009-0783.title: Tomcat Bug Lets Web Applications Access the Files of Other Web Applications
CVE-2009-0783.body: A vulnerability was reported in Tomcat. A remote authenticated user can access other web applications on the target system.A remote authenticated user that can deploy a web application that is the first web application loaded can view or modify web.xml, context.xml, and tld files of other web applications deployed on the target server.Philippe Prados reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0783.extra: A remote authenticated user with privileges to deploy a web application can access other web applications on the target system.

CVE-2009-0787.title: Linux Kernel Bug in ecryptfs_write_metadata_to_contents() Lets Local Users Obtain Portions of Kernel Memory
CVE-2009-0787.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain memory contents.A local user can invoke the ecryptfs_write_metadata_to_contents() function to trigger an out-of-bounds memory read and obtain portions of kernel memory.
CVE-2009-0787.extra: A local user can obtain portions of kernel memory.

CVE-2009-0788.title: Red Hat Network Satellite Server Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Files and Other Information
CVE-2009-0788.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat Network Satellite Server. A remote authenticated user can access files on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can send a specially-crafted HTTP request to the target server to obtain potentially sensitive information about the target host system or to cause the target server to connect to an arbitrary service at an arbitrary IP address [CVE-2009-0788].A remote authenticated user can access an obsolete XML-RPC API to gain access to arbitrary files accessible to the target RHN Satellite server process [CVE-2010-1171].
CVE-2009-0788.extra: A remote authenticated user can access files on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2009-0789.title: OpenSSL ASN1 Structure Memory Access Error Lets Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0789.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote or local user can supply a specially crafted ASN1 structure to an OpenSSL-based application to trigger a memory access flaw and cause the target application to crash.Paolo Ganci reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0789.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2009-0790.title: Openswan ISAKMP R_U_THERE/R_U_THERE_ACK Null Pointer Dereference Lets Remote Users Service
CVE-2009-0790.body: A vulnerability was reported in Openswan. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted ISAKMP R_U_THERE or R_U_THERE_ACK Dead Peer Detection packet to trigger a null pointer dereference cause the target IKE daemon to crash and restart a few seconds later.The vulnerability resides in the Dead Peer Detection (RFC-3706) code.Gerd v. Egidy reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0790.extra: A remote user can cause the target IKE service to crash and reload.

CVE-2009-0790.title: strongSwan ISAKMP R_U_THERE/R_U_THERE_ACK Null Pointer Dereference Lets Remote Users Service
CVE-2009-0790.body: A vulnerability was reported in strongSwan. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted ISAKMP R_U_THERE or R_U_THERE_ACK Dead Peer Detection packet to trigger a null pointer dereference cause the target IKE daemon to crash and restart a few seconds later.The vulnerability resides in the Dead Peer Detection (RFC-3706) code.Gerd v. Egidy reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0790.extra: A remote user can cause the target IKE service to crash and reload.

CVE-2009-0791.title: CUPS Integer Overflow in 'pdftops' Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0791.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when printed by the target user, will cause 'pdftops' to crash or execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target server ('lp' privileges).
CVE-2009-0791.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when printed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0796.title: mod_perl Input Validation Flaw in Apache::Status and Apache2::Status Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-0796.body: A vulnerability was reported in mod_perl. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Apache::Status and Apache2::Status do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the mod_perl software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/perl-advocacy/200904.mbox/%3Cad28918e0904011458h273a71d4x408f1ed286c9dfbc@mail.gmail.com%3E
CVE-2009-0796.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the mod_perl software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-0798.title: acpid Socket Processing Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0798.body: A vulnerability was reported in acpid. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can open a large number of sockets and not close them to cause acpid to enter an infinite loop and consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.
CVE-2009-0798.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to enter an infinite loop and consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.

CVE-2009-0799.title: Xpdf JBIG2 Decoder Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0799.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Xpdf. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when processed by the target user or application, will trigger a flaw in the JBIG2 decoder and cause the application using xpdf to crash.Will Dormann of the CERT/CC created the JBIG2 decoder testsuite that was used to discover these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0799.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash.

CVE-2009-0800.title: Xpdf Buffer Overflows and Memory Errors Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0800.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Xpdf. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user or application, will trigger a buffer overflow or memory free error in the JBIG2 decoder and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user or application.Integer overflows can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0147, CVE-2009-1179].Buffer overflows can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0146, CVE-2009-1182].Several flaws may cause arbitrary memory to be incorrectly freed, executing arbitrary code [CVE-2009-0166, CVE-2009-1180].Input validation flaws can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0800].Will Dormann of the CERT/CC created the JBIG2 decoder testsuite that was used to discover these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0800.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when processed by the target user or application, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0815.title: TYPO3 jumpUrl Mechanism Lets Remote Users View Arbitrary Files
CVE-2009-0815.body: A vulnerability was reported in TYPO3. A remote user can determine the installation path.A remote user can exploit the jumpUrl mechanism to read arbitrary files on the target system. A remote user can obtain the mandatory hash secret used by jumpUrl and then use the value to bypass access controls.
CVE-2009-0815.extra: A remote user can view arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2009-0816.title: TYPO3 Input Validation Flaws in Backend User Interface Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-0816.body: A vulnerability was reported in TYPO3. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Backend User Interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the TYPO3 software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2009-0816.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the TYPO3 software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-0836.title: Foxit Reader 'Open/Execute' File Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0836.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Foxit Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PDF file with a specially crafted 'Open/Execute a file' action that, when loaded by the target user, will execute the specified file on the target user's system [CVE-2009-0836].A remote user can create a PDF file with an 'Open/Execute a file' action with a specially crafted filename that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2009-0837].The vendor was notified on February 20, 2009.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/content/foxit-reader-vulnerabilitiesFrancisco Falcon from Core Security Technologies reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0836.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0837.title: Foxit Reader 'Open/Execute' File Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0837.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Foxit Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PDF file with a specially crafted 'Open/Execute a file' action that, when loaded by the target user, will execute the specified file on the target user's system [CVE-2009-0836].A remote user can create a PDF file with an 'Open/Execute a file' action with a specially crafted filename that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system [CVE-2009-0837].The vendor was notified on February 20, 2009.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/content/foxit-reader-vulnerabilitiesFrancisco Falcon from Core Security Technologies reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0837.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0838.title: Solaris Crypto Driver Memory Free Bug Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0838.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can exploit a flaw in the Solaris crypto pseudo device driver to cause a memory free error, resulting in a system panic.
CVE-2009-0838.extra: A local user can cause a kernel panic on the target system.

CVE-2009-0839.title: MapServer Buffer Overflows and Other Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Create Files on the Target System
CVE-2009-0839.body: Joe Testa from Positron Security reported several vulnerabilities were reported in MapServer. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can create files on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to the 'mapserv' CGI script to trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-0839]. The code will run with the privileges of the web service.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP POST request to the 'mapserv' CGI script to trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2009-0840]. The code will run with the privileges of the web service.A remote user can supply a specially crafted 'id' parameter value to 'mapserv' to create files with arbitrary names on the target system [CVE-2009-0841]. A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/cgi-bin/mapserv?map={mapfile}&mode=query&queryfile={queryfile}&savequery=1&id=/../../../tmp/oopsA local user can create a symbolic link on the target system. Then, a remote user can request a specially crafted 'map' parameter value to access the symlinked file [CVE-2009-0842].A remote user can supply a specially crafted 'queryfile' parameter to determine if specified files exist on the target system [CVE-2009-0843].The vendor was notified on March 10, 2009.The original advisory is available at:http://www.positronsecurity.com/advisories/2009-000.html
CVE-2009-0839.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can create files on the target system.A remote user can determine if files exist on the target system.

CVE-2009-0844.title: Kerberos GSS-API SPNEGO Null Pointer Dereference and Invalid Memory Access Bugs Let Remote Denial of Service
CVE-2009-0844.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Kerberos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can cause the SPNEGO GSS-API get_input_token() function to read beyond the end of a network input buffer and crash [CVE-2009-0844]. Apple Security reported this vulnerability.A remote user can supply specially crafted ContextFlags in the reqFlags field in NegTokenInit to trigger a null pointer dereference in spnego_gss_accept_sec_context() and cause the target krb5 daemon to crash [CVE-2009-0845].
CVE-2009-0844.extra: A remote user can cause the target daemon to crash.

CVE-2009-0845.title: Kerberos GSS-API SPNEGO Null Pointer Dereference and Invalid Memory Access Bugs Let Remote Denial of Service
CVE-2009-0845.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Kerberos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can cause the SPNEGO GSS-API get_input_token() function to read beyond the end of a network input buffer and crash [CVE-2009-0844]. Apple Security reported this vulnerability.A remote user can supply specially crafted ContextFlags in the reqFlags field in NegTokenInit to trigger a null pointer dereference in spnego_gss_accept_sec_context() and cause the target krb5 daemon to crash [CVE-2009-0845].
CVE-2009-0845.extra: A remote user can cause the target daemon to crash.

CVE-2009-0846.title: Kerberos ASN.1 GeneralizedTime Decoder Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0846.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kerberos. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted ASN.1 encoded data to cause the asn1_decode_generaltime() function to free an uninitialized pointer and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.
CVE-2009-0846.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0847.title: Kerberos ASN.1 Decoding Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0847.body: A vulnerability was reported in Kerberos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions against a KDC or kinit program.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the asn1buf_imbed() function to trigger a memory allocation error or, in some cases, trigger a crash.
CVE-2009-0847.extra: A remote user can cause the target KDC or kinit program to crash.

CVE-2009-0856.title: IBM WebSphere Input Validation Flaw in z/OS Sample Application Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-0856.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere on z/OS. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The sample applications do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned APAR PK76720 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0856.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-0857.title: Sun Management Center (SunMC) Input Validation Flaw in Performance Reporting Module Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2009-0857.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sun Management Center (SunMC). A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Performance Reporting Module (/prm/reports) does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'msg' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Sun Management Center (SunMC) software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2009-0857.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Sun Management Center (SunMC) software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2009-0869.title: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager HSM for Windows Buffer Overflow May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0869.body: A vulnerability was reported in the IBM Tivoli Storage Manager HSM for Windows client. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and cause the target client to crash. It may be possible to also execute arbitrary code on the target client.IBM has assigned APAR IC59481 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0869.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0870.title: Solaris NFSv4 Server Kernel Module Infinite Loop Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0870.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.On an NFSv4 server that is sharing an hsfs(7FS) file system (e.g., CD-ROM, DVD media), a local user can exploit a flaw in the NFSv4 Server kernel module rfs4_op_readdir() function to cause the NFSv4 server to enter an infinite loop.
CVE-2009-0870.extra: A local user can cause the target NFSv4 server to hang.

CVE-2009-0871.title: Asterisk Bug in Processing SIP INVITE Request with NULL Header Values Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0871.body: A vulnerability was reported in Asterisk. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.When the system is configured with "pedantic=yes", a remote authenticated user can send a SIP INVITE request with specially crafted null header values to cause the target service to crash.klaus3000 reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0871.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2009-0872.title: Solaris NFS Server nfssec() Bug Lets Remote Users Access Shared Resources
CVE-2009-0872.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Solaris NFS server. A remote user can access resources on the target system.If a filesystem is shared with a combination of the "none" (AUTH_NONE) and "sys" (AUTH_SYS) security modes, a remote user can exploit a flaw in nfssec(5) to view shared resources on the target system.
CVE-2009-0872.extra: A remote user can access resources on the target system.

CVE-2009-0873.title: Solaris NFS Server Access List Bug Lets Remote Users Access Shared Files
CVE-2009-0873.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Solaris NFS server. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in nfsd(1M) in the processing of security mode access list entries to view shared files on the target system.Daniel Van Derveer reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0873.extra: A remote user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2009-0874.title: Solaris Doors Subsystem Flaws Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Deny Service
CVE-2009-0874.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Solaris in the Doors subsystem. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can cause arbitrary door server processes on the target system to hang.A local user in a non-global zone can can access files without having proper permissions and may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system with kernel-level privileges.
CVE-2009-0874.extra: A local user can obtain kernel level privileges on the target system.A local user can cause arbitrary door server processes on the target system to hang.

CVE-2009-0879.title: IBM Director CIM Server Consumer Name Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0879.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Director CIM Server. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a request containing a specially crafted consumer name to cause the target service to crash. The service must be manually restarted to return to normal operations.The vendor was notified on November 3, 2008.Bernhard Mueller of SEC Consult Vulnerability Lab reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.sec-consult.com/files/20090305-1_IBM_director_DoS.txt
CVE-2009-0879.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2009-0888.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0888.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint), Jun Mao and Ryan Smith of iDefense Labs, Haifei Li of Fortinet's FortiGuard Global Security Research Team, the Apple Product Security Team, Matthew Watchinski of Sourcefire VRT, Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research, Mark Dowd of the IBM Internet Security Systems X-Force, Will Dormann of CERT, and Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0888.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0889.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0889.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An anonymous researcher (via TippingPoint), Jun Mao and Ryan Smith of iDefense Labs, Haifei Li of Fortinet's FortiGuard Global Security Research Team, the Apple Product Security Team, Matthew Watchinski of Sourcefire VRT, Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research, Mark Dowd of the IBM Internet Security Systems X-Force, Will Dormann of CERT, and Nicolas Joly of VUPEN Security reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0889.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0896.title: IBM WebSphere MQ Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0896.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere MQ. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data via the MQ client to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Queue managers using SSL or authentication security are not affected.The original advisory is available at:http://xforce.iss.net/xforce/xfdb/50641
CVE-2009-0896.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0909.title: VMware Heap Overflows in VNnc Codec Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0909.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VMware. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML or a specially crafted video file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in the VNnc Codec and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.VMware Workstation, Player, ACE, and Server are affected.Aaron Portnoy from TippingPoint DVLabs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0909.extra: A remote user can create a file or HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0910.title: VMware Heap Overflows in VNnc Codec Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0910.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VMware. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML or a specially crafted video file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in the VNnc Codec and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.VMware Workstation, Player, ACE, and Server are affected.Aaron Portnoy from TippingPoint DVLabs reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0910.extra: A remote user can create a file or HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0914.title: Opera Memory Corruption Error in Processing JPEG Files Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0914.body: A vulnerability was reported in Opera. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted JPEG file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Tavis Ormandy of the Google Security Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0914.extra: A remote user can create an image file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0920.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0920.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The 'OvOSLocale' parameter is affected [CVE-2009-0920].The 'OvAcceptLang' cookie parameter in 'Toolbar.exe' is affected and the 'Accept-Language' HTTP header is affected [CVE-2009-0921].Oren Isacson of Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/content/openview-buffer-overflows
CVE-2009-0920.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0921.title: HP OpenView Network Node Manager Buffer Overflows Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0921.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP OpenView Network Node Manager. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The 'OvOSLocale' parameter is affected [CVE-2009-0920].The 'OvAcceptLang' cookie parameter in 'Toolbar.exe' is affected and the 'Accept-Language' HTTP header is affected [CVE-2009-0921].Oren Isacson of Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/content/openview-buffer-overflows
CVE-2009-0921.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2009-0922.title: PostgreSQL Encoding Conversion Error Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0922.body: A vulnerability was reported in PostgreSQL. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger a stack memory consumption error and cause the target service to terminate connections.The original report is available at:http://archives.postgresql.org/pgsql-bugs/2009-02/msg00172.phpDenis Afonin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0922.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause temporary denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2009-0924.title: Solaris ufs_getpage() and ufs_putpage() Bugs Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0924.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can trigger flaws in the ufs_getpage() and ufs_putpage() functions to cause the system to hang or cause a system panic.
CVE-2009-0924.extra: A local user can cause the target system to hang or panic.

CVE-2009-0925.title: Solaris ufs_getpage() and ufs_putpage() Bugs Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0925.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can trigger flaws in the ufs_getpage() and ufs_putpage() functions to cause the system to hang or cause a system panic.
CVE-2009-0925.extra: A local user can cause the target system to hang or panic.

CVE-2009-0926.title: Solaris ufs_getpage() and ufs_putpage() Bugs Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0926.body: A vulnerability was reported in Solaris. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can trigger flaws in the ufs_getpage() and ufs_putpage() functions to cause the system to hang or cause a system panic.
CVE-2009-0926.extra: A local user can cause the target system to hang or panic.

CVE-2009-0927.title: Adobe Reader JavaScript Input Valdation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0927.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a file containing a specially crafted JavaScript method call that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Tenable Network Security reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.Demonstration exploit code from www.Abysssec.com is available at:http://milw0rm.com/exploits/8595
CVE-2009-0927.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0928.title: Adobe Reader Flaws in JBIG2 Filter Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary
CVE-2009-0928.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a PDF file with specially crafted JBIG2-encoded stream that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the JBIG2 filters and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Sean Larsson of iDefense Labs, Jonathan Brossard from iViZ Security Research Team, Will Dormann of CERT/CC, and Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0928.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0942.title: Mac OS X Help Viewer Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0942.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X Help Viewer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'help:' URL that, when loaded by the target user, will run arbitrary scripting code, which may permit arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A specially crafted 'help:' URL may reference an external Cascading Style Sheet that is not within a registered help book and execute arbitrary AppleScript files [CVE-2009-0942].A specially crafted 'help:' URL may reference an HTML document that is not within a registered help book and execute arbitrary AppleScript files [CVE-2009-0943].Brian Mastenbrook reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0942.extra: A remote user can create a 'help:' URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0943.title: Mac OS X Help Viewer Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0943.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X Help Viewer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'help:' URL that, when loaded by the target user, will run arbitrary scripting code, which may permit arbitrary code to be executed on the target system.A specially crafted 'help:' URL may reference an external Cascading Style Sheet that is not within a registered help book and execute arbitrary AppleScript files [CVE-2009-0942].A specially crafted 'help:' URL may reference an HTML document that is not within a registered help book and execute arbitrary AppleScript files [CVE-2009-0943].Brian Mastenbrook reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2009-0943.extra: A remote user can create a 'help:' URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0944.title: Mac OS X Finder and Spotlight Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0944.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Mac OS X in the Launch Services and Spotlight components. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when downloaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system or trigger a memory access error and cause denial of service conditions.A specially crafted Mach-O executable file may cause Finder to crash and reload repeatedly [CVE-2009-0156].A specially crafted Microsoft Office file may cause the Microsoft Office Spotlight Importer to crash or cause arbitrary code to be executed [CVE-2009-0944].
CVE-2009-0944.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when downloaded by the target user, will cause the target application to crash or execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0945.title: Apple Safari Buffer Overflow in WebKit in Processing SVGList Objects Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0945.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in WebKit's processing of SVGList objects and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Nils reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.
CVE-2009-0945.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0949.title: CUPS IPP_TAG_UNSUPPORTED Structure Initialization Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2009-0949.body: A vulnerability was reported in CUPS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted IPP_TAG_UNSUPPORTED tag to trigger an initialization error in ippReadIO() and cause the target service to crash.The vendor was notified on April 28, 2009.Anibal Sacco from the CORE IMPACT Exploit Writing Team (EWT) at Core Security Technologies reported this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:http://www.coresecurity.com/content/AppleCUPS-null-pointer-vulnerability
CVE-2009-0949.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2009-0950.title: iTunes Stack Overflow in Processing 'itms:' URLs Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0950.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apple iTunes. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted 'itms:' URL that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Will Drewry reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0950.extra: A remote user can create a URL that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2009-0951.title: QuickTime Buffer Overflows in Processing Multiple Media Formats Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2009-0951.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in QuickTime. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted media file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A movie file with specially crafted MS ADPCM-encoded audio data can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0185]. Alin Rad Pop of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted Sorenson 3 video file can trigger a memory corruption bug [CVE-2009-0188]. Carsten Eiram of Secunia Research reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted FLC compression file can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0951]. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted compressed PSD image can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2009-0952]. Damian Put reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A specially crafted PICT image can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0953]. Sebastian Apelt reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A movie file with specially crafted Clipping Region (CRGN) atom types can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0954]. An anonymous researcher reported this vulnerability via TippingPoint.A movie file with specially crafted image description atoms can trigger a sign extension bug [CVE-2009-0955]. Roee Hay of IBM Rational Application Security Research Group reported this vulnerability.A movie file with a specially crafted user data atom can trigger code execution [CVE-2009-0956]. Lurene Grenier of Sourcefire, Inc. (VRT) reported this vulnerability.A specially crafted JP2 image can trigger a heap overflow [CVE-2009-0957]. Charlie Miller of Independent Security Evaluators and Damian Put (via TippingPoint) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2009-0951.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.
